mapper.insert: insert into offer_catalog_location (OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID, OFFER_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK) values (#{offerCatLocId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{offerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update offer_catalog_location set OFFER_ID = #{offerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID = #{offerCatLocId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID, OFFER_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from offer_catalog_location where OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID = #{offerCatLocId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID, OFFER_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from offer_catalog_location

select OFFER_CAT_LOC_ID, OFFER_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from offer_catalog_location where CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{catalogItemId}
